pages.text: If you're lucky, you may find yourself in possession of a $(thing)Moa$()$(item)Egg$(). Hatching this requires a specialised device - an $(item)Incubator$(). Using $(item)Ambrosium Torches$() as fuel, it will slowly incubate the $(thing)Moa until it's ready to hatch, at which point the baby $(thing)Moa$() will appear on top of the $(item)Incubator$()
